1: I seek to protect and cherish what is sacred.
2: I honor and cherish the living and their contributions.
3: Compassionate actions uplift those in need and honor their memory.
4: I inspire respect and kindness in those around me.
5: I trust that your love and patience endure always.
6: I seek to inspire recognition and connection among all people.
7: I work to rebuild and nurture the community around me.
8: I embrace your kindness and seek your support in difficult times.
9: I seek the glory of my purpose and receive support.
10: Let all people recognize the greatness of our divine protector.
11: I support and uplift those in desperate situations.
12: I generously uplift others with kindness and support.
13: I express gratitude and share joy with everyone.
